title: bitkeys
extract: Significance. Keys are used to control the operation of a cipher so that only the correct key can convert encrypted text (ciphertext) to plaintext. ... A key should therefore be large enough that a brute force attack (possible against any encryption algorithm) is infeasible – i.e., would take too long to execute.
extract_html: Significance. Keys are used to control the operation of a cipher so that only the correct key can convert encrypted text (ciphertext) to plaintext. ... A key should therefore be large enough that a brute force attack (possible against any encryption algorithm) is infeasible – i.e., would take too long to execute.
